headline: Nuclear Powered Naval Vessels Market Forecast to Reach USD 33.92 Billion by 2030, Growing at 5.50% CAGR: MarkNtel Advisors (Leading Defense Companies - BAE Systems, Huntington Ingalls Industries, CSSC, Naval Group, Thales Group)
summary: According to a recent market research report by MarkNtel Advisors, the Global Nuclear Powered Naval Vessels Market is poised for significant growth, with projections estimating a value increase from USD 24.6 billion in 2024 to USD 33.92 billion by 2030. This translates to a robust CAGR of 5.50% during the forecast period (2025–2030).
